chantey.title: Blow, My Bully Boys, Blow.
chantey.text:
Oh, Sally Brown's a bright mulatto; _Blow,_ boys, _blow!_ Oh she drinks rum and chews tobacco, _Blow,_ my bully boys, _blow!_
Oh, Sally Brown, I long to see you; _Blow,_ boys, _blow!_ Chorus, etc.
Oh, Sally Brown, I'll ne'e deceiv you, _Blow,_ boys, _blow!_ Chorus, etc.
